name: Wendy's Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and house sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and onion rings on a toasted sesame bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli on a toasted potato bun.

name: Fried Chicken Burger
description: Beef patty topped with pepper jack cheese, fresh jalapeños, spicy mayo, and lettuce.
